abstract: Cargo vessel belonging to Norwegian shipping company Gerbulk reportedly sinks off coast of Vietnam; only 1 of 19 Filipino crew members is known to have survived.
lead_paragraph: A Norwegian shipping company said that one if its cargo vessels had sunk off the coast of Vietnam and that only one of the 19 Filipino crew members was known to have survived.
snippet: A Norwegian shipping company said that one if its cargo vessels had sunk off the coast of Vietnam and that only one of the 19 Filipino crew members was known to have survived.
